directions: Blend garbanzo beans, cilantro, jalapeno pepper, garlic, olive oil, salt, black pepper, and garlic powder in a blender until smooth.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh cilantro, or to taste
1 jalapeno pepper, stemmed and diced - or to taste
1 tablespoon olive oil, or as needed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste
title: Cilantro Jalapeno Hummus
